resources.string:
ToGoZip
Version $versionName$
$about$

History

Improvements v1.0.6.20141207
  • Added support to add text to zip. Short texts will be collected in one file; long texts get one file per long text.
  • Added german translation to existing english.

Improvements v0.2.2.20141120
  • Added Settings Activity to define zip-file.
  • Added Settings Debug Mode: Debug Messages copied to clipboard and added to LogCat.
  • Added this About-Box in Settings.

Initial Version v0.1.1.20141109
  • Created share handler for Add To Zip without a gui.
  • Hardcoded zipfile /sdcard/copy/2go.zip.
  • Implemented view/send/sendto/send_multible for file and folder.
  • Intelligent file renaming if file with same name and different last-modified-date is added.

Links

  • Source code of current version of ToGoZip at git repository@github.com
    https://github.com/k3b/ToGoZip/
  • slf4j logging driver for android eu.lp0.slf4j:slf4j-android
    https://github.com/lp0/slf4j-android
  • slf4j logging for java org.slf4j:slf4j-api
    http://www.slf4j.org/
  • junit Testing support junit:junit
    http://junit.org/
  • powermock-mockito Testing support powermock-api-mockito
    https://code.google.com/p/powermock/
    http://github.com/mockito/mockito
